---
title: "Multiple factors"
author: "Deon de Bruin"
---

```{r}
#| warning: FALSE
#| message: FALSE
library(lavaan)
library(flexplavaan)
library(psychTools)


mod3 <- '
Neuroticism   =~ N1 + N2 + N3 + N4 + N5
Agreeableness =~ A1 + A2 + A3 + A4 + A5
'

fit.mod3 <- cfa(model = mod3, 
                data  = bfi)

summary(fit.mod3, 
        standardized = TRUE, 
        fit.measures = TRUE)


visualize(fit.mod3, 
          subset = 1:10)

measurement_plot(fit.mod3, 
                 sample = 300)

residual_plots(fit.mod3)
```
